text: @realDonaldTrump Trump, it’s your fault the coronavirus is even here in the USA. Why did you order a bus to take those Americans off the ship knowing the coronavirus was spreading through the ship. You also knew about the virus before the public and yet you let infected people in the USA.

domain.name: Person

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
